data.title: Snow Forecasts for 4 Croatian Ski Areas - 18 Aug 2024
data.meta_description: Short, Medium and Long-Range Snow Forecasts for 4 Ski Resorts in Croatia at 18th August 2024. Snowfall and Weather for Croatian Ski Resorts.
data.text:
Croatia Snow Forecasts and Reports for Croatian Ski Resorts

Where is there snow in Croatia?

When will it next snow in Croatia?

There is no snow forecast for Croatia. To view the latest weather predicted for Croatian Ski Resorts, see below.

How much snow is there in Croatia?

We don't have any current snow depths for Croatia but you can use the link below to view skiing conditions at Croatian Ski Resorts.

When did it last snow in Croatia?

We do not currently have reports of recent snowfalls from Croatia, but we hope to soon!

Join J2Ski's Snow Mail

for Croatian snow reports by e-mail.

Top Croatian Ski Resorts by Forecast Snow

No significant snow is forecast for ski resorts here right now.

Top Croatian Ski Resorts by Snow Depth

We have no reports of Snow from ski areas in Croatia at this time.

Croatian Ski Resorts - Forecast Snow Comparison

The latest snow forecasts for Ski Resorts in Croatia - please note that all ski resorts can be affected by weather at short notice, and you should check with the Tourist Office before travelling.

Croatian Snow Forecasts Ski Resort Forecast 48 HrSunMonTueWedThuFriSat 7 DaySnow Conditions Bjelolasica--- Platak--- Velika--- Čelimbaša---

The Croatian snow forecast figures given here are the likely average cumulative snowfall on each day, for the specified ski resort. Local snow depths may vary considerably from slope to slope.

Off Piste and Avalanche Safety

Ski Safe : If you intend to ski or snowboard out of bounds in Croatia, you must check conditions locally before doing so. Always check the Avalanche Risk Level and carry appropriate avalanche safety equipment at all times.

Croatian Snow Forecast Table Key

Snow Forecast - links to 7-Day medium-range and 14-Day long-range Snow Forecasts.

48 Hours - total snowfall forecast in the next 48 hours.

7 Days - total snowfall possible over the next 7 days.

Status - ski area status (Open/Closed/Unknown).

Snow Conditions - current skiing conditions.

All Snow Forecasts beyond 2 days are subject to change. The multi-day snowfall totals above are the total quantity of fresh snow expected to fall, and do NOT account for settling and compaction that will occur.
